replies.body:
What if you gave your username and password to your kids to pass on to their kids to pass on to their kids and so on.
Would make a great story :p

> [{quoted}](name=Jencarna,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=BrOE5YKm,comment-id=0007,timestamp=2015-08-18T12:08:24.474+0000)
>
> What if you gave your username and password to your kids to pass on to their kids to pass on to their kids and so on.
> Would make a great story :p

then I'd get banned in game for account sharing.
nice try riot, your undercover agents won't work against me.

sorry i didn't know :/
undercover agents lmao, do you actually think they want you banned or have some personal grudge on you or something.

> [{quoted}](name=Jencarna,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=BrOE5YKm,comment-id=000700000000,timestamp=2015-08-19T12:12:39.891+0000)
>
> sorry i didn't know :/
> undercover agents lmao, do you actually think they want you banned or have some personal grudge on you or something.

yes

What's up Arclight Vayne.
Mama you so naughty.

> [{quoted}](name=Bipolar,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=BrOE5YKm,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2015-08-18T10:33:42.013+0000)
>
> What's up Arclight Vayne.

i'm not OC.

> [{quoted}](name=Ediwir,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=BrOE5YKm,comment-id=00010001,timestamp=2015-08-18T10:43:51.657+0000)
>
> They received an email a while ago from a player claiming to be an immortal vampire and asking if it was really gonna be lifted after 120 years.
> Apparently yes, he will be able to play after that. He still has about 117 years to go.
> 
> As for this specific ban, they usually give you a different date according to the reason, but 2129 is new to me. Should ask.

It's probs for calling people retarded.
which if they weren't, I wouldn't have to do.
Must as well say it was a permaban

They received an email a while ago from a player claiming to be an immortal vampire and asking if it was really gonna be lifted after 120 years.
Apparently yes, he will be able to play after that. He still has about 117 years to go.

As for this specific ban, they usually give you a different date according to the reason, but 2129 is new to me. Should ask.

> [{quoted}](name=Genisys,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=BrOE5YKm,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-08-17T01:36:56.216+0000)
>
> Must as well say it was a permaban

yeah.
but like I didn't do anything to warrant it recently. maybe some of my older posts, yeah, but no recent ones.
It's cause some guy had a grudge against me and reported like half of my posts.

2129... soon!

I know a guy who waited a ten year ban out in another game, he was banned for 3650 days and logged on to retell the legend.
Rip in pieces

i hate that they dont even tell you what its for. you'd think with riot wanting reform from players they'd tell us exactly what is and isnt acceptable and why we're banned for each and every situation. its literally offensive. my butt could not possibly be any more hurt

> [{quoted}](name=GigaPube,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=BrOE5YKm,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2015-08-17T04:21:13.422+0000)
>
> i hate that they dont even tell you what its for. you'd think with riot wanting reform from players they'd tell us exactly what is and isnt acceptable and why we're banned for each and every situation. its literally offensive. my butt could not possibly be any more hurt

I know exactly what I was banned for though.

but they didnt tell you did they? you probably know from the time/s you posted something offensive/inappropriate/etc.

also reported

You know wats funny?
The ban ends 9/12/**2129**

> [{quoted}](name=Zen Bot,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=BrOE5YKm,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-08-17T03:42:52.206+0000)
>
> You know wats funny?
> The ban ends 9/12/**2129**

wow thank u i never noticed that!!!1 ur such a genius, godbless you!!!! you should become a super hero to help out those less intelligent than you. I have the perfect name. 'Captain Obvious'. it fits really nicely.
Why thank you <3
In game ban or ban from forums?

> [{quoted}](name=whitehatingcoon,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=BrOE5YKm,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-08-17T01:47:44.012+0000)
>
> In game ban or ban from forums?

boards.
I'm not gonna behave badly enough to get my account banned in game.
Lol that date when the ban will end. We will all be dead already...
